featuredTutorials.title: Getting Started
featuredTutorials.description: Vault secures, stores, and tightly controls access to tokens, passwords, certificates, API keys, and other secrets in modern computing. Get started here.

featuredTutorials.title: Getting Started with Vault UI
featuredTutorials.description: Manage Vault environment as well as your secrets using Vault UI.

featuredTutorials.title: Getting Started with HCP Vault
featuredTutorials.description: Quickly get hands-on with HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP) Vault using the HCP portal and setup your managed Vault cluster.

featuredTutorials.title: App Integration
featuredTutorials.description: Integrate your applications with Vault. Some tutorials leverage tools and some tutorials demonstrate code examples.

featuredTutorials.title: HCP Vault
featuredTutorials.description: Learn how to provision and connect to HCP Vault clusters.

featuredTutorials.title: Custom Secrets Engines
featuredTutorials.description: Learn how to build a custom secrets engine to rotate your own tokens, passwords, and more with Vault and a target API.

packageManagers.label: Ubuntu/Debian
commands: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install vault
